alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Camas Prairie (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 12:52PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Camas County through 145 PM MDT... At 1252 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Corral, or 10 miles west of Fairfield, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Smoky Dome around 120 PM MDT. Baumgartner Campground around 140 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
